attributes.action: help more with winter fuel bills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: gordon brown said that everyone is going to benefit from the new home effiency scheme, that is not true. i have recently found out that i cannot have any help, although i am a single parent with two children and am on benefits. people in my situation cannot afford boiler services or heating check-ups, although ihave a fairly new house. i only have the minimum amount of cavity wall insulation, but this is not enough to keep the house warm. i was told outright that there is no help for me. who else is having problems getting the help that gordon brown has promised us?
